title: Multilingual Resume Writing Mastery Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and proficiency in a foreign language (beginner level or higher)
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using web-based applications, designed for learners to acquire multilingual resume-writing skills tailored to diverse cultural contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design a resume structure reflecting cultural differences in three languages (Korean, English, Japanese).
Learners can create field-specific customized resumes using a specialized terminology database provided by a web-based application.
Learners can produce high-quality multilingual resumes through peer feedback and expert verification systems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
